TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualizingPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel
Public MustInherit Class VirtualizingPanel Inherits Panel
public ref class VirtualizingPanel abstract : System::Windows::Controls::Panel

summary.span: 提供 項目的架構，這些項目會虛擬化其子資料集合。

span.span: Provides a framework for elements that virtualize their child data collection.

summary.span: 這是 abstract 類別。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此內容中，「 虛擬化 」 是指一種技術之子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]該項目會產生較大的數字的資料為基礎的項目會在螢幕上看見的項目。In this context, "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on the screen. 則會耗用記憶體和處理器，以產生大量的大量[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數給定的時間，可能會在螢幕上的項目。It is intensive, both in terms of memory and processor, to generate a large number of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few may be on the screen at a given time. 繼承自面板，例如、 計算可見的項目，並搭配從(例如或) 只建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素的可見項目.A panel that inherits from , such as the , calculates visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to only create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements for visible items. 下列清單描述的案例時無法虛擬化的容器項目：The following lists describes cases when the cannot virtualize item containers: - 包含不同類型的項目容器。The contains item containers of different types. 例如，可能必須同時使用的項目和做為項目容器的物件。For example, a might have items that use both and objects as the item containers. - 您明確建立項目容器。You explicitly create the item containers to the . 明確與隱含地建立項目容器的相關資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about explicitly versus implicitly creating item containers, see the class. 當是虛擬化的容器項目，您可能需要儲存容器而不是與資料項目本身相關聯的狀態資訊。When a is virtualizing item containers, you may need to save state information that is associated with a container instead of with the data item itself. 例如，如果項目包含在控制項，狀態會繫結項目容器中，而非本身的資料項目。For example, if an item is contained by an control, the state is bound to the item container, and not to the data item itself. 當的新項目，目前的值會重複使用用於新的項目。When the is reused for a new item, the current value of is used for the new item. 此外，舊的項目不會保留其值。In addition, the old item does not retain its value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用衍生類別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example demonstrates how to use the derived class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. [!code-xaml[virtualizingstackpanel_intro#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取是不虛擬化項目之高於或低於檢視區的空間量。The cache is the amount of space above or below the viewport in which items are not virtualized. 使用快取，以避免產生[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目時要捲動檢視。Use a cache to avoid generating [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements as they’re scrolled into view. 屬性會決定所使用的度量單位。The property determines the unit of measurement that is used by .
